short.ar: اجعل جهاز الكمبيوتر يعمل بسلاسة عن طريق تعليق علامات التبويب التي لا تستخدمها
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Make your computer run smoothly by suspending the tabs you aren't using
short.de: Lass deinen Computer geschmeidiger laufen, in dem du Tabs aussetzen lässt, die du nicht benutzt
short.es: Haz que tu ordenador funcione sin problemas al suspender las pestañas que no estás usando
short.it: Fai funzionare il computer senza intoppi sospendendo le schede che non stai usando
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Faça o seu computador funcionar sem problemas suspendendo as guias que você não está usando
short.ru: Заставь свой браузер работать быстрее, приостанавливая неактивные вкладки
short.sk: Zabezpečte plynulý chod počítača pozastavením tabov, ktoré nepoužívate
short.tr: Kullanmadığınız sekmeleri askıya alarak bilgisayarınızın sorunsuz çalışmasını sağlayın
short.zh_CN: 冻结暂时用不到的标签页，以便释放系统资源。
short.zh_TW: 凍結暫時用不到的分頁，達到系統資源釋放。

long.ar,de,es,it,ja,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,sk,tr,zh_C:
This version of TGS is the latest stable without tracking. Please check https://github.com/greatsuspender/thegreatsuspender/issues/1263 for more details.

You can find more information about the project on https://gioxx.org/2021/02/06/the-marvellous-suspender-hello-world/
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
This version of TGS is the latest stable without tracking. Please check https://github.com/greatsuspender/thegreatsuspender/issues/1263 for more details.

You can find more information about the project on https://gioxx.org/2021/02/06/the-marvellous-suspender-hello-world/

Please read carefully: https://gioxx.org/2024/06/24/the-marvellous-suspender-the-last-dance/#en-us (in italian: https://gioxx.org/2024/06/24/the-marvellous-suspender-the-last-dance/).
